ALPHA_USER.title: Alpha User
ALPHA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Alpha test. We've come a long way since then, but this user was on the front lines helping catch early bugs and shape Journally since the beginning!

BETA_USER.title: Beta User
BETA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Beta test. The hero Journaly needs.

BUG_HUNTER.title: Bug Hunter
BUG_HUNTER.description: Has reported and helped us track down bugs, making Journaly better for everyone!

SPAM_REPORTER.title: Spam Reporter
SPAM_REPORTER.description: Has helped us maintain our wonderful community and culture of meaningful content by reporting a spam post!

CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.title: Code Contributor
CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.description: Has contributed code to the Journaly codebase. You can find the Journaly source code, and contribute yourself, at https://github.com/Journaly/journaly

NECROMANCER.title: Necromancer
NECROMANCER.description: Gave new feedback on a post that's over a week old.

ODRADEK.title: Odradek
ODRADEK.description: Did something that has no apparent function.

TEN_POSTS.title: 10 Posts
TEN_POSTS.description: Published 10 posts. Really starting to get going now!

TEN_THANKS_GIVEN.title: 10 Thanks Given
TEN_THANKS_GIVEN.description: Gave 10 thanks to other Journalers for their feedback.

HIKER.title: Hiker
HIKER.description: This user achieved their weekly goal 4 weeks in a row!

TRAIL_RUNNER.title: Trail Runner
TRAIL_RUNNER.description: This user achieved their weekly goal 6 weeks in a row!

MOUNTAIN_CLIMBER.title: Mountain Climber
MOUNTAIN_CLIMBER.description: This user achieved their weekly goal 8 weeks in a row!

NOVELIST.title: Novelist
NOVELIST.description: This user wrote a post over 1,000 words long!

MULTILINGUAL.title: Multilingual
MULTILINGUAL.description: This user has written posts in 2 languages!

POLYGLOT.description: This user has written posts in 4 or more languages!

HELPER.title: Helper
HELPER.description: This person has wrriten a post in their own native language which provides learners of their language authentic reading materials!
